text: Ba jang moputso oa bohanyapetsi ba ke ke ba atleha haese feela baatlehisoake Satane (liabolosi) a ithapalalitseng ka ts’ebelisano ‘moho. Ke hobane ba re: “khoebo e ts’oana le bohanyapetsi;” Allah U lumelletse khoebo, o hanetse bohanyapetsi. Haele ea amohetseng keletso e tsoang ho Mong`a hae, a ikhule ketsong e joana, a boloke litsoala tsa tse fetileng; nyeoe ea hae e ho Allah. Joaloka ka ea tla khutlela bohanyapetsing, – Ruri ke balekane ba mollo. Ba tla phela moo kahosafeleng
